ComicInfo.Title: Blood from a Stone
ComicInfo.Summary: Blood from a Stone: Broadway meets Lavonne, a beautiful girl with wings who spends the evening socializing and snacking with him. They make a date for the next night as well but Brooklyn and Lexington tag along for company. Little do the trio know that Lavonne is a vampire who has been genetically manipulated by Dr. Phobos to be attractive to Gargoyles so she can get close to them and suck their blood. Lavonne likes her new companions but eventually succumbs to her nature and bites Broadway's neck. The sun begins to rise during their struggle and Broadway turns to stone as Lavonne burns up.
